original: BERG, Nils, Disponent^ Figeholm, f Bergsjö, Gävleb l, 6/8 92 av dir O F B o Anna Johnsson, gm Elsa Åkerlind. Anst i Ulvsunda Sågverks AB 21, insp o försäljn.ch där, disp v Trävaru AB Efraim Jennes i Figeholm sed. 31. Ordf i kommunalflm, köpingsstyr, brandstyr, skogsbrandstyr o luftskyddsnmd, v. ordf i kommunalstämma, v. luftskyddschef i Tuna-läns hd, v. brandch i Figeholm, led av kyrko-flm. Sv repres v avtalsförhandl m utl om trävaror. Styr.led i Södra Sv Exportfrn, Kalmar mfl läns trävaruexportföreningar samt i Bilbränsleproducenternas Riksförb. V. styr.ordf 0 huvudm i Figeholms Sparbk. V. ordf i Fp:s valkretsfrb f Kalmar län, ordf i dess arb.utsk o i distr.styr o Figeholmsavd. Ordf 1 Figeholms Skyttefrn 32—41, nu hed.ordf, fd ordf i Figeholms Pistolskyttefrn o Lstfrn, styr.led i Kalmar läns Norra Skyttefrb, ordf i Figeholms fältskyttekrets o i Figeholms Brandsk.frn, styr.led i Kalmar läns Brand-kårsfrb. Hobbies: Skytte, brandskydd.
translated: BERG, Nils, Executive^ Figeholm, born in Bergsjö, Gävle County, 8/6 1892, son of director O.F.B and Anna Johnsson, married to Elsa Åkerlind. Employed at Ulvsunda Sawmill AB from 1921, inspector and sales representative there, then manager at Efraim Jennes Timber AB in Figeholm since 1931. Chairman of the municipality film committee, municipal council, fire department, forest fire department, and air defense committee, deputy chairman of the municipal meeting, deputy air defense chief in Tuna County, deputy fire chief in Figeholm, member of the church committee. Swedish representative in international timber contract negotiations. Board member of Southern Swedish Export Association, Kalmar and other county timber export associations, and Fuel Producers National Association. Deputy chairman and head of main office at Figeholms Savings Bank. Deputy chairman of the Free Party's constituency association for Kalmar County, chairman of its work committee and district board, and Figeholm branch. Chairman of Figeholms Shooting Society from 1932 to 1941, now honorary chairman, former chairman of Figeholms Pistol Shooting Society and Rifle Society, board member of Northern Shooting Federation in Kalmar County, chairman of Figeholms field shooting district and Figeholms Firefighters Association, board member of Kalmar County Fire Brigade Federation. Hobbies: Shooting, fire protection.

deputyChairmanOf.name: Free Party's Constituency Association for Kalmar County
